quote: If it's on your chest, go ahead and prove somethin.
author: Cameron Thomaz

quote: I'll hazard I can do more damage on my laptop sitting in my pajamas before my first cup of Earl Grey than you can do in a year in the field.
author: Q - Skyfall

quote: Sure, there are grays... but when you come right down to it, at its core, beneath every choice, there's either a one or a zero. You either do something or you don't.
author: Mr. Robot
